metadata.title: CVE-2023-30584 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been discovered in Node.js version 20, specificallywithin the experimental permission model. This flaw relates to improperhandling of path traversal bypass when verifying file permissions.Please note that at the time this CVE was issued, the permission model isan experimental feature of Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
